description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'MenuItemAdapter' that extends 'ListAdapter' for displaying menu items in a RecyclerView within an Android application. It manages the binding of menu item data to UI components, handles user interactions such as adding items, adjusting quantities, toggling favorites, and animates list item appearances.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for displaying a list of MenuItem objects in a RecyclerView, handling item interactions and visual binding.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for MenuItemAdapter, holding references to UI components for a single list item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder and sets up click listeners.
